overview: The protagonists of movie Kanchi – Hira (Daya Hang Rai) and Kanchhi (Sweta Khadka) have chosen and carved a respectful life for them in the high Himalayan region of Nepal. These two representatives of today’s youth, who have been friends since early childhood, fall in love as the movie progresses. The desire to get one another’s love is so strong that neither their family nor the opposing society has power enough to stop them. Despite circumstances pushing them apart and their paths being diverged against their will, all they desire and want is love.
title: Kanchhi
